pullrequest.title: Include test_results in pre-clean of workspace (for docker)

content.raw:
interesting, if it is a subfolder of build/ removing build/ with -r should be enough to clean, but that was how the script was before this PR.

It could be that the current implementation on docker works fine, but the one in pbuilder is failing. We can probably decline this PR.
